pr_title: [To rel/0.11] [IOTDB-1069] restrict the flushing memtable number to avoid OOM when mem_control is disabled

timeline.message: Merge branch 'restrict_memtable_11' of https://github.com/apache/iotdb into restrict_memtable_11
Merge branch 'rel/0.11' of https://github.com/apache/iotdb into restrict_memtable_11

timeline.bodyText: We shouldn't use wait without notify. We should notifyAll at "decreaseMemtableNumber"
timeline.author: SilverNarcissus

timeline.bodyText: After interrupt. We should also throw the exception. Or this will loop forever without wait. (When enter wait with interrupt, wait will just return without wait.)
